ygData.subject: Re: Magical Weapon
ygData.msgSnippet: Patty, When i hit 17 i found myself looking to get cash as well. But i didnt want to skimp out on exp either. I was sick and tired of befallen so i decided to
ygData.messageBody:
Patty,

When i hit 17 i found myself looking to get cash as well. But i didnt want
to skimp out on exp either. I was sick and tired of befallen so i decided to
go test my luck at Lake Rathe. Well lets just say i was there for a long
long time and still am. During the day look for the occasional gnoll
embalmer or high shaman (Shamans have runed totem staffs while embalmers
carry magic skulls and crysknives ) Or hunt any of the aviaks you see, the
drop bronze weapons and cash or words for research, all sell for a few gold
or plat. At night the undead come out and they are somewhat tough so get in
a group and kill the drybones for small bronze.

Thats what i did around your level.

Lothaniel/Rayne

> ----------
> From: Patricia Halas[SMTP:patty_halas@...]
> Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com

> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Subject: [warriors_eq] Magical Weapon
>
> From: Patricia Halas <patty_halas@...>
>
> I am currently in HH collecting extra ringmail to sell in Halas so I can
> have enough money to buy a combine longsword but it is getting so boring.
> I
> have nevered seen that named gnoll fellow even though I spend most of my
> time hunting gnolls. At any rate, it there a better place for a level 17
> Warrior to get herself a magic weapon then HH (or saving up plat for a
> combine sword).
>
>
>
> For the Honor and or May the blessings of
